mapper.select: SELECT A.TMTAB_SN , A.CRS_CRE_CD , A.DECLS_NO , A.TMTAB_DAY , A.TMTAB_MONTHDAY , A.TMTAB_ODR , A.TMTAB_TYPE , (SELECT FN_GET_CODE_NAME('TMTAB_TYPE',A.TMTAB_TYPE)) AS TMTAB_TYPE_NM , A.SBJ_CD , ( SELECT SBJ_NM FROM tb_crs_ofln_sbj WHERE SBJ_CD = A.SBJ_CD ) AS SBJ_NM , A.EDU_TM , A.USER_NO , ( SELECT USER_NM FROM tb_usr_user_info WHERE USER_NO = A.USER_NO ) AS USER_NM , A.ADD_TCH , A.EDU_CTS , A.REG_NO , A.REG_DTTM , A.MOD_NO , A.MOD_DTTM , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO)) AS MOD_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO)) AS REG_NM FROM tb_crs_ofln_crs_tmtab A WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND DECLS_NO = (CASE WHEN #{declsNo} = null THEN DECLS_NO WHEN #{declsNo} = 0 THEN DECLS_NO ELSE #{declsNo} END) AND TMTAB_DAY = (CASE WHEN #{tmtabDay} = null THEN TMTAB_DAY WHEN #{tmtabDay} = 0 THEN TMTAB_DAY ELSE #{tmtabDay} END) ORDER BY TMTAB_DAY, TMTAB_ODR
SELECT A.TMTAB_DAY , COUNT(*) AS SUB_CNT FROM tb_crs_ofln_crs_tmtab A WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND DECLS_NO = #{declsNo} GROUP BY TMTAB_DAY ORDER BY TMTAB_DAY

SELECT A.TMTAB_SN , A.CRS_CRE_CD , A.TMTAB_DAY , A.TMTAB_MONTHDAY , A.TMTAB_ODR , A.TMTAB_TYPE , (SELECT FN_GET_CODE_NAME('TMTAB_TYPE',A.TMTAB_TYPE)) AS TMTAB_TYPE_NM , A.SBJ_CD , ( SELECT SBJ_NM FROM tb_crs_ofln_sbj WHERE SBJ_CD = A.SBJ_CD ) AS SBJ_NM , A.EDU_TM , A.USER_NO , ( SELECT USER_NM FROM tb_usr_user_info WHERE USER_NO = A.USER_NO ) AS USER_NM , A.ADD_TCH , A.EDU_CTS , A.REG_NO , A.REG_DTTM , A.MOD_NO , A.MOD_DTTM , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO)) AS MOD_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO)) AS REG_NM FROM tb_crs_ofln_crs_tmtab A WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND DECLS_NO = #{declsNo} AND TMTAB_SN = #{tmtabSn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_crs_ofln_crs_tmtab ( TMTAB_SN , CRS_CRE_CD , DECLS_NO , TMTAB_DAY , TMTAB_MONTHDAY , TMTAB_ODR , TMTAB_TYPE , SBJ_CD , EDU_TM , USER_NO , ADD_TCH , EDU_CTS , REG_NO , REG_DTTM , MOD_NO , MOD_DTTM ) SELECT #{tmtabSn} , #{crsCreCd} , #{declsNo} , #{tmtabDay} , #{tmtabMonthday} , NVL((MAX(TMTAB_ODR)),0)+1 , #{tmtabType} , #{sbjCd} , #{eduTm} , #{userNo} , #{addTch} , #{eduCts} , #{regNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , #{modNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') FROM tb_crs_ofln_crs_tmtab WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND TMTAB_DAY = #{tmtabDay}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_crs_ofln_crs_tmtab SET TMTAB_DAY = #{tmtabDay} , TMTAB_MONTHDAY = #{tmtabMonthday} , TMTAB_ODR = #{tmtabOdr} , TMTAB_TYPE = #{tmtabType} , SBJ_CD = #{sbjCd} , EDU_TM = #{eduTm} , USER_NO = #{userNo} , ADD_TCH = #{addTch} , EDU_CTS = #{eduCts} , MOD_NO = #{modNo} , MOD_DTTM = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND DECLS_NO = #{declsNo } AND TMTAB_SN = #{tmtabSn}

update.foreach: UPDATE tb_crs_ofln_crs_tmtab SET TMTAB_DAY = #{item.tmtabDay} , TMTAB_MONTHDAY = #{item.tmtabMonthday} , TMTAB_ODR = #{item.tmtabOdr} , TMTAB_TYPE = #{item.tmtabType} , SBJ_CD = #{item.sbjCd} , EDU_TM = #{item.eduTm} , USER_NO = #{item.userNo} , ADD_TCH = #{item.addTch} , EDU_CTS = #{item.eduCts} , MOD_NO = #{item.modNo} , MOD_DTTM = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{item.crsCreCd} AND DECLS_NO = #{item.declsNo} AND TMTAB_SN = #{item.tmtabSn}
